question: Which of the following clearly define the Indian National Movement?
option1: Movement started by Subhash Chandra Bose through I.N.A.
option2: Struggle by the Indians to gain freedom from British colonial rule in India
option3: Struggle by Indians to gain dominion status under British rule
option4: Struggle by Indians to stop British trade in India
answer: Struggle by the Indians to gain freedom from British colonial rule in India
explanation: The Indian National Movement was an organised mass movement. It is concerned with the interests of the people of India and affected by both internal and external factors. It led to the formation of Indian National Congress in 1885 and several revolts broke out across the country.
